name: Tube Runner WEBGL Demo
description:
How to Play Avoid Running into obstacles until you reach Finish.

Controls:

  • Move character by Pressing "A or D" Buttons.
  • Press "Space" to Jump
  • Press "R" For quick level reload.
For best experience play in full screen mode.

If you liked Demo try full version here: https://edgarsbgames.itch.io/tuberunner
